document_data.mainbody:
Smiley Gheef was a businessman from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Gheef was a human man with hazel eyes and tan skin. He worse his facial hair in a thick black beard.
In the , as the city of Baldurs Gate shuddered under the Absolute crisis, certain goods started to become rare and expensive. One such material that skyrocketed in price was saltpeter. Smiley Gheef sought to purchase a shipment of barreled saltpeter from the dwarvish trader Djingo and participated in a bidding war against Kaet Ling and Pheebs Splayfoot. Djingo charged at least 500 gold pieces per barrel, a high price as he knew that once Baldurs Gate was besieged, hed easily sell it for double the amount to the Gates steel watcher foundry. Smiley Gheef offered 700 gp per barrel, but the bidding war ended abruptly when Kaet Ling offered to pay 1,000 gp per barrel, in cash, no notes. Despite the loss, Gheef was hopeful for future transactions.
